title: Справа НБР
overview: The plot of the series revolves around the NBR, an elite special unit created to hunt down the most dangerous predators in human form. It is headed by a hardened operative Koval (Sergei Strelnikov), whose team works as a single mechanism: ruthlessly, quickly, on the verge of a foul. But where is the fine line beyond which the thirst for justice turns into blind rage? What awaits the team when they are ruled by emotions? Each of them has their own secret - and it's a mystery that keeps you in suspense to the very end. And crime is getting stronger and stronger...
